name: baby octopus
notes:
with this pattern, you will be able to make as many baby octopi as you would like. this is the perfect project for beginner crocheters.

you will receive two pdf (english & french).

difficulty
beginner

skills required
crocheting in spiral, magic ring, chain, slip stitch, single crochet stitch, increasing and decreasing.

materials
- about 13g of #6 bulky yarn weight, (you can use any yarn for this project). suggested yarns: parfait chunky, honey bunny, baby snuggle, himalayan dolphin, paintbox chenille.., etc.
- 4mm crochet hook
- 12mm safety eyes
- polyester fiberfill for stuffing 
- yarn needle, scissors, stitch markers
- optional: strand of pink yarn for the cheeks

final size
they are about 5 cm (2”) high when made with indicated yarn.
